Control Name: Communicates System Objectives—The entity communicates its objectives to personnel to enable them to carry out their responsibilities.

control_attributes.Control: Communicates System Objectives—The entity communicates its objectives to personnel to enable them to carry out their responsibilities.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC2.2 COSO Principle 14: The entity internally communicates information, including objectives and responsibilities for internal control, necessary to support the functioning of internal control.
